document_data.name: Improved Sanctuary
document_data.mainbody: '''''Improved sanctuary''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s of [[Cyrrollalee]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, an area with a {{SI|30|ft|long=yes}} radius around the caster had the effect of a ''[[sanctuary]]'' spell. The effects of the spell only affected creatures friendly to the caster. Anyone protected by the spell could not attack an enemy, if so the effects of the spell no longer protected said individual.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required [[material component]]s, the holy symbol of Cyrrollalee and a small mirror made from [[silver]].
